channel.title: Opening my port and forwarding it
channel.description: Okay to start off with, YES, i did read all the tutorials and YES i searched other places. I want to be able to open my port for a rsps so yes i think it falls in this category on the forums. I use portforward.com and i set it up my port just like how it is except when i check it, it says my port is not opened. Could someone please open my port for me? I just wanna make my own server for some of my friends so we can play on it.
